Entries.AndyStrawberrySeeds: Heya @,^^Here's three bags of strawberry seeds. These ought to help you durin' your first season in the valley. Farmers gotta stick together these days.^^ -Andy %item object 745 3 %%
Entries.GuntherGift: Dear @,^^Enclosed is a portion of the funding we were recently awarded by the Regional Secretary of Artifacts. Thanks to your generous donations, the museum has become a major contributor to ongoing efforts to conserve Ferngill's cultural heritage. I hope these funds provide assistance in your future adventures.^^ -Gunther %item money 40000 40001 %%
Entries.AndyJojaCola: Heya @,^^I got lucky in a raffle and landed myself a lifetime supply of Joja cola! These'll help keep your energy up while you're working on the farm.^^  -Andy %item object 167 50 %%
Entries.AndyAncientSeeds: @,^Found these while I was foraging deep in the forest. Not exactly sure what they are, but I reckon you're better equipped to cultivate them than me. Lemme know what pops up if you get em growing.^^  -Andy %item object 114 5 %%
Entries.SusanIntroduction: Hello, @^^My name is Susan. Lewis told me you're a new farmer in town. I'm trapped on my farm in the mountains so I can't say hi in person! Hopefully the mess Joja made will be cleared out soon, because I'm going a little stir crazy. Can't wait to meet you and see how the farm is shaping up!^^  -Susan
Entries.SusanFertilzer: Hello @!,^^This is some of the best fertilizer I've made. Grow something delicious and share it with me!^^  -Susan %item object 369 20 %%
Entries.SusanMelonSeeds: @!^^My melons are growing like wildfire this year! Here's some extra seeds I got when I popped a number of them in my seedmaker. Don't go trying to compete with me for the melon market though... I'll win!^^  -Susan %item object 479 5 %%
Entries.VictorDewey: Dear @,^^I'm writing to thank you for listening to me in the graveyard. I know conversations like that can be stressful. If Dewey ever returns, I know he'll be just as happy to have you for a friend as I am.^^  Sincerley, Victor
Entries.OliviaWine: Dear @,^^The market went my way and I cashed out some of my shares for a huge windfall! To celebrate, I ordered a case of my favorite wine, and I wanted to share a few bottles with you. Let's have a glass together soon!^^  -Olivia %item object 348 5 %%
Entries.OliviaCellar: Dear @,^^I wanted to thank you for being such a sweetheart and listening to me the other day. I know I can get a little maudlin when I've had a few glasses. Next time we have a drink, I'll tell you about some of the marvelous places I've visited. It's easy to forget there's a world outside of the valley sometimes, but I have plenty of stories to share.^^  All my love, Olivia
Entries.AbigailJunimo: Hi @,^^I'm still processing what we talked about the other day. I've got more questions than answers. I can't believe that I'm not the only one. I know you won't, but please don't mention this to anyone. I think that this secret just has more secrets underneath it, and I'm not sure I'm ready to turn over all the rocks in my life. Let's talk more soon.^^  -Abby
Entries.GusSophia: Hi @,^^Just wanted to drop you a quick line to ask you not to mention what I told you to Sophia. I trust you to be discreet. It's important we're on the same page. Looking forward to seeing you at the saloon soon.^^  -Gus
Entries.HaleyTalk: @,^^Thanks for being kind the other day. I was totally freaking out and you were super patient. I talked to Emily and she's being super helpful and understanding too. I know I can be a  real brat sometimes. We should talk again soon.^^  -Haley
Entries.KentSummit: Hey @,^^Sorry again for getting so worked up the other day. I wanted to let you know I've started talking to a professional about this. Ever since I came back, I never know what'll set me off. It's time I get my life in order.^^  -Kent
Entries.PierreSVERebate: @,^^Thanks to you and the quality produce you've been shipping, my store's business is booming. Along with our regular rebates, I wanted to send you a special bonus. Thanks for being such a good customer and contributor to our small community. It's people like you who keep local businesses alive.^^  -Pierre %item money 2000 5001 %%
Entries.JojaRockslideNotice: To our valued JojaMart customers:^^Please be advised that the landslide blockage near the railroad will be cleared using explosives tomorrow morning. Avoid the area in case of falling rocks. Joja Co. is not responsible for any damage incurred to people or property in the vicinity.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement1: Dear resident:^^Our records indicate that you may not have a membership at JojaMart. Did you know that Joja has consistently scored top in the industry for quality and value? A membership may seem like a big investment, but it unlocks so much - it's a real lifechanger! Join today, and become part of the Joja family.^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement2: Dear resident:^^In our time in STARDEW VALLEY, Joja has made an effort to become a contributing member of the community. But we can't do it without your help! If you choose to shop at Joja competitors such as PIERRE'S GENERAL STORE, you won't have the same assurance of quality and consistency. And without your business, we won't be able to afford to contribute as much as we'd like to local charities.^^^^Shop at JojaMart and help keep your community great!^^JojaMart: We Value Your Business
Entries.SVEadvertisement3: Is work stressing you out? Why not take a trip to the Fern Islands? The Islands are a bustling center of commerce, famous for ring fruit! Even those on a tight budget will find plenty to enjoy! From the sparkling-clean beaches to lush tropical forests, the Fern Islands are a natural oasis that appeals to beachgoers, birdwatchers, and appreciators of nature from all walks of life. Come chase your bliss on the Fern Islands!^^This advertisement paid for by the Fern Islands Bureau of Tourism.
Entries.SVEadvertisement4: Getting sick of watering crops? Upgraded tools still not doing the job? Running a farm is hard work. Consider hiring some farmhands to help! Especially in high-output seasons like the fall, having a few spare folks around can be invaluable for saving time. Plus, you help create jobs for your local community. Check your local bulletin board to see if anyone's looking for work!
Entries.SVEadvertisement5: ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME:^^Special yeast starter with nutrients designed to optimize wine fermentation from a quality-controlled yeast ranch. Has produced award-winning wine consistently since the strain was started almost twenty years ago. Inquiries welcome at Sunshine Vineyard.
Entries.SVEadvertisement6: Are you homebrewing beer? Fermenting your own grapes? Sick of your pricy liquids leaking or drying up in low-quality storage? Try hardwood barrels! They don't leak, they naturally repel liquids, and they're almost completely immune to temperature changes, so no more nasty cracks. Craft them yourself, or stop by Grampleton and pick some up from one of our many talented artisans!
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^You might need some more space someday! That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house. The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^   Your local carpenter,^   Robin
Entries.JasThankYouLetter: To Farmer @,^^Aunt Marnie said I needed to write a thank you letter. So... thanks for finding me in the forest and taking me back home. I won't go that far in the forest again.^^  -Jas
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^^Tomorrow we're all gathering by Andy's house and walking to the fishing spot in the forest for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis
Entries.OliviaDatingLetter: Dear @,^^I've been having feelings about our relationship we just started. I need to tell you some things. Can you visit me at my residence when you have a chance?^^  -Olivia
Entries.OliviaPartyLetter: Hi honey,^^I'm throwing a house party tonight at my residence. Most of the townsfolk will be there, along with my special guest: the governor!! I would absolutely love you to come, @. The party starts at 6:00PM. Don't be late!^^  -Your love, Olivia
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBomb: @,^^The mines are dangerous. These cherry bombs will help during your expeditions.^^Be careful.^^   -Marlon %item object 286 5 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterCherryBombX: @,^^We received an extra shipment of supplies from Castle Village. I believe you can make good use of these. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 286 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterBomb: @,^^Your assistance in monster eradication has been most helpful to our efforts in protecting the valley. These bombs will help you on your adventures. Stay safe.^^  -Marlon %item object 287 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterMegaBomb: @,^^The guild received another shipment of weapons from Castle Village. These bombs pack a punch. Don't stand too close to them once ignited.^^  -Marlon %item object 288 10 %%
Entries.MarlonLetterPotions: @,^^Camilla, the witch of Castle Village, supplied 30 elixers to the guild. This is one of her finest brews yet. I'm mailing you half of them. These will assist in your expeditions. Good luck.^^  -Marlon %item object 773 15 %%

Entries.marlon_event4: Yes, there are. The further down you go, the more monsters you'll encounter that have been...#$b#That have been corrupted for many years. It gives them supernatural strength.

Entries.1000009/f Haley 1750/w sunny/k 15/u 17 1: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 89 54 0 Haley 97 62 1/pause 300/viewport 97 62 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*... *sniff*"/shake Haley 800/move farmer 0 7 2/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*..."/shake Haley 800/move farmer 0 2 1/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 300/move Haley 0 -2 0/pause 400/emote Haley 28/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1500/speak Haley "Hi, @...$2"/pause 400/textAboveHead Haley "...*sniff*"/shake Haley 1000/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Is everything okay?#Why are you crying?"/fork 1000009_EverythingOkay/pause 500/speak Haley "...*sniff*$2"/pause 100/switchEvent 1000009_EverythingOkay
Entries.1000009_EverythingOkay: pause 600/speak Haley "...$2"/pause 200/emote Haley 28/pause 200/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 400/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 1200/speak Haley "I had a panic attack a little bit ago. I came here to the park to calm down.$2#$b#When they start I can't breathe, I just want to curl up into a ball...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#That's a really scary feeling...#Panic attacks are easy to deal with."/fork 1000009_RespectPrivacy/pause 500/friendship Haley -1000/speak Haley "That's so mean an insensitive of you to say.$3#$b#Just... leave me alone.$3"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue "...Don't tell anyone you saw me crying.$2#$b#Sometimes I... things happen to me. It's not a big deal. Okay?$2"
Entries.1000009_RespectPrivacy: pause 500/speak Haley "I... I can't keep this to myself.$2#$b#My sister would never understand. Alex would never understand. You might, though.$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/pause 400/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*..."/shake Haley 800/pause 2000/move Haley 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Haley "Yesterday, during the fair, someone... a stranger...$2"/pause 700/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*"/pause 1000/speak Haley "A stranger touched me...$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 300/speak Haley "I left Alex and went to get some of Gus's burgers. Maru told us the BBQ sauce was delicious, and we wanted to try it.$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "... *sniff*"/shake Haley 800/pause 1000/speak Haley "When I walked up the stairs, an old man came over to me. He... he was bald and reeked of alcohol...$2#$b#He said my outfit was... cute... and that the girls in Stardew Valley were... attractive.$2"/pause 500/emote Haley 28/pause 350/speak Haley "He was really creeping me out so I turned to leave and he... he...$2"/pause 300/speed Haley 4/move Haley 0 -2 0/shake Haley 3000/emote farmer 60 true/pause 350/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*... *sniff*...."/shake Haley 1000/pause 1500/speak Haley "He grabbed me...$2#$b#He put his hands on me, all over me.$2#$b#I kicked him in the groin and yelled at him. I ran to Mayor Lewis and told him what happened.$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*..."/shake Haley 1500/pause 2000/speak Haley "...We couldn't find him. He was gone.$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Say nothing and let her talk#You're overreacting about this."/fork 1000009_SayNothing/pause 500/shake Haley 4000/pause 500/emote Haley 12/speak Haley "GET AWAY FROM ME!!! LEAVE!! YOU'RE HORRIBLE!$5"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Haley -1500/end dialogue Haley "I can't believe what you said to me. You're the most insensitive person I've ever met.$2#$e#I told my sister about what happened to me... and what you said to me. She isn't happy with you either. Now leave.$2#$e#%Haley is ignoring you."
Entries.1000009_SayNothing: pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*sniff*..."/shake Haley 1000/pause 1500/faceDirection Haley 2/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 1000/speak Haley "... I walked home, got into the shower to scrub away that feeling.$2#$b#Nothing like this has ever happened to me before. Sometimes guys in Zuzu City will yell things... but not... not this.$2"/pause 500/speak Haley "I don't know how to move forward after what happened... I feel... violated.$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "(I know what I have to say)#You need to tell your sister about what happened."/fork 1000009_TellSister
Entries.1000009_TellSister: pause 500/speak Haley "...You're right. I'll tell Emily. I don't know if she'll understand, but she always listens. It'll at least help me cope with this...$2"/pause 1000/speak Haley "I'm... I'm going to go for a walk and take some pictures. That always makes me feel better.$2#$b#I have a favor to ask.$2"/pause 200/question fork1 "Can you check on me later today?#Yes#No"/fork 1000009_CheckOn/pause 500/speak Haley "Oh... I shouldn't ask too much of you.$2"/pause 1500/speak Haley "I'll see you later, @.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Haley "Hi, @. I told Emily what happened. She was really supportive.$2#$b#It was... it was just what I needed. I still... feel weird, but I'm doing better. Thank you so much for talking me through that.$2"
Entries.1000009_CheckOn: pause 500/speak Haley "...Thanks.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Haley/pause 1000/friendship Haley 125/speak Haley "I'm... going to go now.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail HaleyTalk/pause 700/end dialogue Haley "I told Emily what happened. She was really supportive.$2#$b#It was... it was just what I needed. I still... feel weird. Thanks for talking me through that.$2#$e#%Haley is doing much better. She smiles at you."

Entries.1000012/t 1200 1700/f Penny 1750/k 38/w: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 48 53 1 Penny 61 53 0 Pierre -150 -150 2/pause 300/viewport 61 53 true/skippable/pause 250/textAboveHead Penny "Тимоти..."/move farmer 7 0 1 true/pause 3000/textAboveHead Penny "Я должна была сделать больше..."/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 800/emote farmer 8/move Penny 0 0 3/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "Добрый день, @.$2"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#Ты выглядишь сегодня подавлено.#Я просто прохожу мимо. Увидимся."/fork 1000012_EverythingAlright/pause 500/speak Penny "Увидимся, @...$2"/pause 300/end position 83 53
Entries.1000012_EverythingAlright: pause 500/speak Penny "Извини, я просто задумалась...$2"/pause 550/playSound doorClose/warp Pierre 44 57/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 4 0 0 true/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 0/move Pierre 0 -8 3 true/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/pause 1000/emote Penny 28/pause 400/emote farmer 60/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/speak Penny "Я проходила мимо дома Дженкинса и вспомнила кое-что.$2#$b#Это было еще до того, как ты приехал сюда.^Это было еще до того, как ты приехала сюда.$3#$b#В доме где живет Дженкинс раньше жила другая семья...$0#$b#У них был сын, которого звали Тимоти. Я обучала его, Джас и Винсента.$3"/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 3/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 2/pause 350/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1000/speak Penny "Ты не против прогуляться со мной до моста, @?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Конечно, Пенни.#Конечно, но лучше побыстрее."/fork 1000012_WalkBridge/pause 500/speak Penny "Я постараюсь не занимать слишком много твоего времени.$2"/switchEvent 1000012_WalkBridge
Entries.1000012_WalkBridge: pause 500/speak Penny "Пошли.$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/move Penny 7 0 2 true/pause 1200/move farmer 7 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 73 54 2/warp Penny 74 54 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Penny 2/positionOffset farmer -5 25/stopMusic/pause 600/viewport 73 54 true/pause 1500/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1200/playMusic echos/pause 1700/speak Penny "Тимоти был хорошим ребенком. Ему нравилось учиться и помогать другим. Он, Джас и Винсент были хорошими друзьями.$2#$b#Однажды, Тимоти опоздал на занятия в библиотеке. Он вел себя... необычно тихо.$2#$b#Ему всегда нравилось учиться, поэтому я решила что его поведение - странное.$2"/pause 1100/emote Penny 28/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Penny "...Затем я заметила синяки на его руке... и я... я сразу поняла что случилось.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/pause 300/speak Penny "Я не знала что делать... Я продолжала вести занятие ещё несколько часов но в итоге не смогла больше сдерживаться.$2#$b#Я дала Джас и Винсенту задание и отвела Тимоти в сторону.$2#$b#Я спросила его про синяки и пообещала, что все, что он скажет, останется между нами.$2#$b#Он начал плакать. Его отец сказал, что Тимоти не должен кому-то говорить о том, что случилось и что это секрет.$2#$b#Если он кому-нибудь скажет, то его отец об этом узнает и Тимоти снова будет плохо.$2"/pause 1000/shake Penny 2000/pause 650/speak Penny "Я хотела тут же пойти в дом Тимоти и убить его отца за то, что он сделал.$5#$b#But... Но... Я знала что от этого будет только больше проблем и Тимоти окажется в опасности.$2"/pause 400/emote Penny 28/pause 200/speak Penny "Я закончила вести урок и повела детей домой.$2#$b#Обычно мы провожали Тимоти первым, так как его дом был ближе всего к библиотеке, но в этот раз мы сначала проводили Винсента и Джас.$2"/pause 1250/speak Penny "После того как Джас и Винсент были дома, я сказала Тимоти, что я хочу помочь ему, и поклялась жизнью что его отец больше не сделает ему плохо.$2"/pause 1500/speak Penny "Я отвела Тимоти в дом мэра и рассказала что произошло. Льюис опешил. Он вызвал полицию из Зузу и они отправили патруль в дом Тимоти.$2#$b#Полиция забрала его отца и поместили Тимоти под защиту.$2"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Penny/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 650/speak Penny "Скоро их дом выставили на продажу. Я не знаю что случилось с Тимоти, его отцом и мамой, Синди.$2#$b#Где бы Тимоти сейчас ни был... Я надеюсь он в порядке...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/question fork1 "Думаешь я поступила правильно, @?#Ты сделала всё что могла..#Тебе не следовало лезть в дела семьи."/fork 1000012_BetterNow/pause 500/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 250/emote Penny 12/shake Penny 999999999/pause 700/speak Penny "Ты говоришь что было бы лучше стоять в стороне в то время когда невинного ребенка избивает собственный отец!?$5#$b#Ты ТАКОЙ ЖЕ МОНСТР! Не подходи ко мне, @!$5"/emote farmer 28/friendship Penny -1500/end dialogue Penny "Не подходи ко мне.$5#$e#%Пенни игнорирует вас."
Entries.1000012_BetterNow: pause 700/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 500/speak Penny "Спасибо, @.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 0 0 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 800/speak Penny "Прости. Я не хотела тебя так сильно задерживать.$2#$b#Эти мысли терзали меня уже некоторое время.$2#$b#Спасибо, что выслушал меня.^Спасибо, что выслушала меня.$0"/pause 1000/speak Penny "Я надеюсь что остаток дня пройдет у тебя хорошо.$2"/pause 700/move Penny 6 0 1 true/pause 400/friendship Penny 125/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1000/end dialogue Penny "Привет, @.$0#$b#Мм...$2#$b#Пожалуйста, не говори никому о том, что я сказала о Тимоти. Мы оба можем попасть в неприятности из-за этого...$2"

Entries.1000006/w rainy/f Shane 1750/z winter/t: rain/-500 -500/farmer 29 61 0 Shane 29 46 0/pause 300/viewport 29 46 true/skippable/textAboveHead Shane "...Я больше не такой."/move farmer 0 -13 0/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 150/emote Shane 16/speak Shane "Привет. Не ожидал увидеть тебя здесь.$3"/pause 500/speak Shane "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 shane_event1#Что ты делаешь возле путей?#$r -1 0 shane_event2#Почему ты здесь один?#$r -1 0 shane_event3#Похоже что тебе есть что рассказать."/pause 1050/move Shane 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak Shane "По правде говоря, в последний раз когда я пришел сюда, я планировать прыгнуть под поезд. Я был более чем готов к тому, что все это закончится.$3#$b#Я чувствовал будто все вокруг меня рушится и мир становится менее... менее реальным.$0#$b#Самоубийство казалось единственным оставшимся выходом. Тяжело поверить что это всё происходило со мной не так уж и давно...$3"/pause 2000/speak Shane "Я даже потратил время на изучение того, как правильно прыгнуть под поезд... если ты сделаешь это неправильно, то есть шанс, что ты можешь потерять ноги и истечь кровью или оказаться разрезанным пополам.$2#$b#Ты знал это?^Ты знала это?$2"/pause 1700/speak Shane "Я и правда верил что у меня больше нет будущего, нет ничего ради чего я мог идти вперед...$3"/pause 300/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 450/speak Shane "Брр. Не знаю о чем я думал, говоря тебе это.$3#$b#Видимо я снова перебрал. У меня все ещё болит голова.$2"/pause 1000/speak Shane "...$2"/pause 1000/move Shane 0 0 2/pause 800/shake Shane 700/pause 1100/speak Shane "Пожалуй мне стоит попить воды.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Shane 25/pause 700/end position 29 48

Entries.1000021_Treat: pause 500/jump Jas/pause 1000/speak Jas "В этот раз она принесла мне леденец Готоро! Она всегда приносит что-то новое.$1"/pause 900/move Jas 0 0 3/pause 700/emote Jas 28/pause 800/move Jas 0 0 1/pause 350/speak Jas "Мне грустно, что мы сражаемся с империей Готоро. Они прямо как мы.$3"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Jas "Почему мы должны сражаться друг с другом, @?$3"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Война это сложно, давай верить, что скоро снова воцарится мир.#Они начали эту войну, но мы ее закончим."/fork 1000021_GotoroFriends/pause 1000/stopMusic/speak Jas "...$2"/pause 500/shake Jas 1000/pause 1500/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/move farmer 0 0 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 16 0 1 true/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 200/shake Jas 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Jas -750/end dialogue Jas "...$2#$e#%Джас выглядит расстроенной."
Entries.1000021_GotoroFriends: pause 700/speak Jas "...$3"/pause 850/speak Jas "Я буду счастлива если это случится. Мне кажется Юки тоже будет счастлива.$3#$b#Я не хочу, чтобы кого-то ранили. Я хочу, чтобы все были друзьями.$0#$b#Если мы можем быть друзьями с Юки, возможно однажды мы сможем быть друзьями с империей Готоро.$1"/pause 750/move Jas 0 2 1/move farmer 0 0 2/move Jas 2 0 0/pause 500/speak Jas "Я пойду домой и покажу тете Марни этот леденец!$1#$b#Зайди к Юки. Она привезла кучу классных вещей сегодня.$0"/pause 1000/move Jas 6 0 1 true/pause 300/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1300/friendship Jas 50/end dialogue Jas "Тебе что-нибудь приглянулось у Юки? Entries.1000018/f Jodi 2500/z spring/z fall/z wi: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 24 90 3 Jodi 13 90 0/pause 300/skippable/viewport 16 90 true/pause 250/playSound wateringCan/move farmer -5 0 3/playSound wateringCan/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 200/emote Jodi 16/pause 150/speak Jodi "Привет, @.$1#$b#Сегодня очень жарко и поэтому цветы нужно поливать чаще чем обычно.1"/pause 600/move Jodi -1 0 0/pause 600/playSound wateringCan/pause 600/speak Jodi "Я просто поливаю цветочки!$1"/pause 1000/playSound wateringCan/pause 900/emote Jodi 28/pause 700/question fork1 "#Уйти#Ты в порядке?"/fork 1000018_TalkToMe/pause 500/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 29 82
Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#Это все Кент...$2#$b#Я люблю его и я рада, что он вернулся домой но...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "С тех пор как он вернулся, он просто... не похож на себя.$2#$b#Он больше не смеется. Не разговаривает со мной. Он практически игнорирует Винсента и Сэма. Он почти не ест. У нас даже не было-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "Он немного рассказывал мне о тех кошмарах, что с ним произошли. О вещах которые он видел. Друзьях, которых потерял. Через что он прошел, когда его схватили...$2#$b#Вчера, Винсент смотрел мультики и случайно нажал на кнопку на телевизоре, после чего картинка замерла...$2#$b#Кент сразу же упал на пол и положил руки на голову...$2#$b#Позже, он рассказал мне, что на их базе, картинка на телевизоре замирала прямо перед тем, как звучала тревога. Так они понимали, что пора прятаться в укрытие.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Харви дал мне кое-какие лекарства, которые должны помочь справиться с симптомами ПТСР.$2#$b#Я не уверена, что это хоть как-то помогает.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*шмыг*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "Мне... *шмыг* мне страшно видеть его таким, и я не знаю как помочь ему, @. Я чувствую себя такой беспомощной...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Кент сейчас нуждается в тебе больше, чем когда-либо.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#Тебе стоит поискать врача в Зузу или Пайн-Меза."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#Извини, @. Я всегда старалась держать это в себе и возможно рассказала слишком много.$2#$b#Спасибо что выслушал меня.^Спасибо что выслушала меня.$2#$bТы, Оливия и Кэролайн - мои близкие друзья и вы всегда рядом и готовы помочь мне.$2"/pause 1500/speak Jodi "Я надеюсь что однажды смогу помочь вам тоже.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 jodi_event3#Если тебе что-нибудь понадобится, я всегда могу помочь.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#Вместе вы сможете это преодолеть."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "Я последую твоему совету.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "Мне нужно дополивать цветы. Давай поговорим позже. Еще раз спасибо.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Спасибо за разговор, @. Теперь я знаю, что делать, чтобы помочь Кенту. Я думаю всё вскоре наладится.$0"

Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Спасибо, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "Сперва тебе стоит знать, что у нас и Пьера были не самые простые отношения, но я люблю его и всегда буду любить, @.$2#$b#Мы стали встречаться еще в молодости. Вскоре я застала Пьера с другой девушкой в Грэмплтоне.$2#$b#Я была опустошена когда узнала... Я полагала что лучшим ответом на это будет... переспать с кем-нибудь, чтобы отомстить.$2#$b#Этим человеком...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "Этим человеком был Расмодиус...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Пьер и Я сильно поругались и... расстались. Мы снова сошлись через пару месяцев.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Вскоре после этого я забеременела. Я... Я не знала чей это был ребенок.$2#$b#Я никогда не говорила Пьеру, что я была с другим, поэтому у него не было причин полагать, что Абигейл - не его дочь.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "С тех пор, как Абигейл покраслиа свои волосы в фиолетовый несколько лет назад, они никогда не меняли цвета. Я подумала что это очень странно...$2#$b#Теперь моя дочь видит магических существ в лесу и интересуется сражениями с монстрами...$2#$b#Есть только одно объяснение. Абигейл - не дочь Пьера. Расмодиус - её отец.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "Я не разговаривала с Расмодиусом много лет. Наши отношения давно в прошлом. Он был удивлен, когда увидел меня на своем пороге.$2#$b#Я рассказала ему о Абигейл и что она - его дочь. Он сказал, что у него было чувство, что один из жителей долины - его ребенок.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "Я... Я так разрыдалась. Я чувствовала себя ужасно из-за того, что он только сейчас узнал об этом.$2#$b#Он сварил мне какое-то зелье для успокоения и объяснил, кто такие Джунимо и почему она может их видеть.$2#$b#Он успокоил меня и дал пару советов.2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "Я все еще не знаю, что сказать Пьеру и должна ли я вообще ему говорить. И ещё Абигейл...$2#$b#Расмодиус сказал, что я должна принимать решение что делать дальше.$2#$b#Я рада что он не заставляет меня сказать ей об этом. И не требует, чтобы я позволила ему общаться с ней. Я... Я чувствую себя виноватой.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "Я расскажу своей семье, но не сейчас. Не говори об этом НИКОМУ, @. Пожалуйста...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#Не волнуйся, я никому не скажу об этом.#Я расскажу Абигейл и Пьеру - у них есть право знать."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#Я верила тебе! ТЫ УЖАСНЫЙ ЧЕЛОВЕК!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "Ты всё ещё не сказал ничего Пьеру и Абигейл, чего ты ждешь, @?^Ты всё ещё не сказала ничего Пьеру и Абигейл, чего ты ждешь, @?#$3#$e#%Кэролайн игнорирует вас."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Спасибо.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "Я... Я знаю что это всё не должно было тебя касаться. Entries.1000020/z winter/f Gus 500/w sunny/t 600: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 36 39 1 Gus 44 44 2/skippable/pause 500/viewport 41 44 true/pause 250/move farmer 5 0 2/pause 350/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 0 5 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 16/pause 500/speak Gus "А, привет, @!$0"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Gus "Здесь и правда прекрасный вид на Самоцветное Море!$1"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "Что привело тебя в виноградник?$0"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 gus_event1#Я хотел проверить, здесь ли София.^Я хотела проверить, здесь ли София.#$r -1 0 gus_event2#Я иду на пляж.#$r -1 0 gus_event3#Почему ты здесь?"/pause 1000/speak Gus "Я купил пять ящиков вина иридиевого качества у Софии.$1#$b#В салуне осталась всего одна бутылка. Entries.1000020_Mystery: pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/emote Gus 40/pause 300/speak Gus "Хм... и правда. Entries.1000020_SophiasParents: pause 1000/speak Gus "Родители Софии...$2"/pause 650/playMusic echos/pause 1250/speak Gus "Они погибли в ужасной аварии...$2#$b#Все произошло на I-63Z, к югу от Зузу. Entries.1000019/f Dwarf 2500/w sunny/z spring/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 69 12 1 Dwarf 80 9 1/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 77 10 true/pause 250/move farmer 9 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1800/speak Dwarf "Звезды сегодня горят ярко.#$b#Они напоминают мне о светящихся пещерах Ватаку, которые заливались светом тысяч лунных камней в полнолуние."/pause 500/question fork0 "#Что такое Ватаку?#Это твой дом?"/fork 1000019_Venture/switchEvent 1000019_Venture
Entries.1000019_Venture: pause 1000/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Да. Ватаку был моим домом. Это давно забытая шахта, освоенная моим народом - большая сеть пещер под Каскадными горами.#$b#Я мечтаю когда-нибудь снова их посетить. Я рад называть тебя своим другом.^Но ты не такая как остальные люди. Я рад называть тебя своим другом."/pause 900/speak Dwarf "Хотя твой вид меня пугает. Вы представляете большую угрозу, чем Теневой народ.#$b#У меня свои обиды на них, но проблемы, которые они причиняют ничто по сравнению с потенциалом людей к разрушению."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 dwarf_event1#Почему люди пугают тебя?#$r -1 0 dwarf_event2#Почему ты так относишься к людям?"/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Dwarf "Человеческие технологии ужасают."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "У твоего народа есть устройства, которые стреляют маленькими снарядами со скоростью света, летающие машины которые извергают огонь...#$b#Неразрушимые двигающиеся металические коробки с ужасающим оружием и бомбами, которые могут в мгновение сравнять города с землей."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Человеческие технологии подходят к той критической точке, когда ваша раса может потерять контроль над ними.#$b#Вы используете дар систематизации чтобы создавать оружие смерти. Я боюсь что это оружие станет причиной уничтожения всей вашей расы, как это было с эльфами.#$b#Эльфы уничтожили себя много лет назад. Их сила стала слишком большой, чтобы они могли контроллировать ее..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "Я вижу много сходств между людьми и эльфами."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "С великой силой приходит великая ответственность."/pause 700/emote Dwarf 40/pause 300/speak Dwarf "Но надежда все еще есть. Есть много людей как ты, @.#$b#Я верю что новое поколение людей будет мудрее, добрее чем раньше."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 2/pause 1000/emote Dwarf 40/pause 1400/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null#(Что мне ответить?)#$r -1 0 dwarf_event3#В людях есть также много хорошего.#$r -1 0 dwarf_event4#Я не согласен. Ты недооцениваешь нас.^Я не согласна. Ты недооцениваешь нас."/pause 1300/move Dwarf 1 0 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "Я хотел бы еще немного посмотреть на звезды, прежде чем вернусь в пещеру.#$b#Тебе должно быть уже холодно. Тебе следует пойти домой."/pause 1200/speak Dwarf "Прощай, @."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end position 40 20

Entries.1000005_Friends: pause 900/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "Мне... приснился плохой сон о моем отце прошлой ночью. Не о Деметриусе. О моем биологическом отце.$2#$b#Я тебе никогда не рассказывал о нем. Я стараюсь о нем вообще не думать. От этого становится только хуже.$2#$b#Есть причина, из-за чего мама развелась с ним.$2"/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Он был жестоким, постоянно пил и играл в казино. Она устала от того что он обкрадывал нас, поэтому она спрятала наши деньги. Он....$0#$b#Ему это не понравилось...$2"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "Я вернулся домой из школы. Мои родители ругались наверху. Ничего необычного. Они постоянно ссорились несколько раз в неделю.$0#$b#Затем я... услышал звук бьющегося стекла и крик моей мамы.$2#$b#Я побежал наверх и увидел как мой отец ударяет маму снова и снова, пока она лежит на полу и плачет.$2#$b#Я схватил вазу и кинул в него. Entries.1000001/f Alex 1750/k 911526/e 2481135/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 29 57 0 Alex 20 57 1/pause 550/skippable/viewport 28 49 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Alex "Привет!"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 3/move Alex 6 0 1/speak Alex "Не ожидал здесь кого-то встретить.$1#$b#Я прихожу сюда чтобы покачаться. Здесь снаряжение лучше чем у меня в комнате!#$b#Не говоря о том, что здесь можно расслабиться в сауне после тяжелой тренировки!$0"/pause 700/move Alex 1 0 1/pause 700/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Alex "Помнишь когда проход сюда был заблокирован?$5#$b#Джоджа разгружала какие-то большие ящики и один из грузовиков врезался прямо в гору, вызвав обрушение.$2#$b#Джоджа определенно не спешила с исправлять свои ошибки. Сьюзан была изолирована от Пеликана несколько месяцев.$5"/pause 500/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Alex "Тебе возможно удалось услышать большой взрыв, похожий на землятрясение вскоре после твоего приезда.$2#$b#Это Джоджа взрывала эту скалу с помощью динамита...$5"/pause 1000/move Alex 0 0 2/pause 750/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 700/speak Alex "Итак, что привело тебя сюда?"/speak Alex "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 alex_event1#Я пришел в сауну.^Я пришла в сауну.#$r -1 0 alex_event2#Захотелось передать привет Сьюзан.#$r -1 0 alex_event3#Я иду на гору!"/pause 1000/move Alex 0 0 3/pause 800/emote Alex 28/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Alex "Знаешь... Я не всегда тренировался каждый день.$2"/pause 700/playMusic desolate/pause 800/speak Alex "Я расскзаывал тебе о том, как я жил со своим отцом когда был моложе. Условия жизни были... тяжелыми.$2"/pause 800/move Alex 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Alex "Еда была способом справиться с проблемами. В один момент я ел больше 4000 калорий в день. Я выглядел... тучным.$2#$b#Я знал что то, что я делал нельзя было назвать здоровым образом жизни. Я продолжал говорить себе: 'я начну завтра' или 'я займусь этим'. Я занимался несколько дней и просто... сдавался.$5#$b#Дни превращались в недели. Недели в месяцы. Я только говорил и ничего не делал.$2"/pause 1000/speak Alex "В один день я понял, что пора прекращать. Я понял, что мои мечты никогда не станут явью до тех пор пока я не начну сам контроллировать свою судьбу. Так я заставил себя заниматься каждый день.$0#$b#Было тяжело поначалу, но со временем, я начал видеть результаты моих трудов и это подхлестывало меня заниматься больше и больше.$0#$b#Я не мог поднять штангу ни разу. Сейчас? Я могу сделать это тридцать раз подряд.$1"/pause 800/speak Alex "Тебе тоже стоит пойти за своей мечтой, неважно как много усилий придется приложить или как далека твоя цель.#$b#Тебе удалось превратить заросшую свалку в красивую ферму. Я завидут тому, как много тебе удалось сделать.$0"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Alex "Извини. Иногда меня заносит.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "#Это многого стоило. Ты тоже многого достиг.#Ты слишком много говоришь о себе."/fork 1000001_Inspiring/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/emote Alex 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Оу... Прости, @. Хм... ладно, увидимся...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex -500/end dialogue Alex "...Sorry about my rant earlier.$2"

Entries.6665290_JojaWarehouse: pause 500/move Morris 0 -4 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/playSound doorClose/pause 700/playSound doorClose/pause 600/warp Jas -303 -303/warp Vincent -202 -156/warp Olivia -200 -200/warp Caroline -199 -199/warp Jodi -198 -198/warp Demetrius -197 -197/warp Penny -195 -195/warp Gus -150 -150/warp Morris 32 13/warp farmer 32 16/pause 200/changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 32 15 true/pause 2100/speak Morris "Корпорация хранит ресурсы на этом складе уже некоторое время.$4#$b#Я все еще удивлен, что Мэр Льюис позволил нам купить его - подписал бумаги и все такое.$0#$b#Но благодаря этому у нас теперь есть отправная точка для следующей стадии.$1#$b#Интересно что поменяло мнение Мэра по этому поводу...$0"/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 3/pause 800/move Morris 0 0 1/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Morris "Эти ящики и коробки...$0#$b#То что ты видишь здесь - это будущее долины Стардью.$1#$b#С помощью этих материалов мы скоро сможем сделать жизнь здесь лучше для всех... буквально.$4#$b#Мили дорог, дома, магазины, центральное водоснабжение, стабильные электрические сети...$0#$b#Долина Стардью станет частью цивилизованного мира и все благодаря твоей помощи.$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/showFrame Morris 34/pause 800/speak Morris "Теперь... о других местных фермерах и остальных предпринимателях.$0"/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/shake Morris 400/pause 600/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Эм...$2#$b#Я должен признать, что я вел себя... неправильно по отношению к населению, когда мы только открылись.$2"/pause 700/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 800/showFrame Morris 32/pause 700/speak Morris "@, ты...$2"/pause 500/shake Morris 600/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 29/pause 700/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Morris "Тебе удалось много достигнуть на своей ферме, попасть в национальные новости, одновременно создавая общество и не загрязняя окружающий мир.$8#$b#Если тебе удалось это сделать... то и Джоджа возможно сможет. Я хочу предпринять тот же подход.$9#$b#Какой смысл со всем этим развитием, если люди, которые должны здесь жить, будут выброшены?$8#$b#Это идет против моей цели сделать республику Фернгилл лучше.$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 27/pause 1000/speak Morris "Я все делал неправильно.$7"/pause 800/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/speak Morris "Самая большая проблема, с которой сталкивается Джоджа - общественные отношения. Текущая ситация удручает. Общественное мнение о нас никогда не было настолько низким.$7#$b#Я собираюсь искать решение вместе с местными предпринимателями и фермами.$8#$b#Мне нужно лишь подумать о том, как проводить изменения.$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 29/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/showFrame Morris 0/pause 1000/speak Morris "Ты можешь помочь мне обдумать это, @?$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/message "С помощью Джоджа, будущее Пеликана выглядит лучше чем когда-либо! Моррис стал абсолютно другим человеком."/pause 1000/end dialogue Morris "Я ценю наш разговор на складе, @.$0"

Entries.1000034/e 100162/j 8: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer 6 19 0 Marlon 6 13 2/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 17/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/playSound doorClose/pause 800/shake Marlon 600/textAboveHead Marlon "You've proven yourself!"/pause 150/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 700/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 600/speak Marlon "You've ventured into the mines with utmost courage, @!#$b#We could use someone with your skills. Do you want to join the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/jump farmer/pause 1200/speak Marlon "@...$2#$b#Do you swear under oath, to protect humanity from monsters, and to do everything in your power to uphold the traditions, values, and ideology of the Adventurer's Guild?$0"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1400/move Marlon 0 1 2/pause 700/speak Marlon "On behalf of Stardew Valley and the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, I officially accept you as the 23rd Adventurer's Guild member!$1"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "As a member of the Adventurer's Guild, you will be allowed to purchase rare weapons we commission and discover!#$b#There are also bounties and quests you can access from the notice board behind me!"/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 350/emote farmer 8/speak Marlon "Don't mind Gil. He just took some of his meds and he's dozing off. I'll inform him of our new member when he awakens."/pause 700/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 750/speak Marlon "Welcome to the guild, @. I expect great things from you."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Marlon "How is adventuring? If you need a sharper sword, I can put in a good word with Clint."

Entries.1050034/e 1000034/j 30/k 1090501: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 Marlon 4 11 2/pause 1000/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/pause 3000/warp farmer 6 19/playSound doorClose/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Ah. You're back."/pause 330/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak Marlon "@. I've been meaning to have a conversation with you.#$b#I'm sure you have several questions as to who we are, what we do, and the history of this guild.#$b#If you would please join me in my quarters, I'll explain all of this to you."/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd like to hear the history of the guild.#Sounds like a long talk. No thanks."/fork 1050034_GuildHistory/pause 800/speak Marlon "Hmm. I see. If that's your choice, so be it.$2"/pause 1200/speak Marlon "Do you need a new weapon? Take a look at what we have in stock."/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end position 4 13
Entries.1050034_GuildHistory: pause 1000/speak Marlon "Follow me."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp farmer 4 5/warp Marlon 6 5/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 250/viewport 7 6 true/pause 1500/speak Marlon "Hmm... where to begin..."/pause 600/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "I'll start with the history of the guild.#$b#I founded the Adventurer's Guild over 25 years ago, after being recognized by the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras.#$b#Our Order is made up of over fifty guilds and clans around the world, spanning every continent.#$b#Our mission is to protect humanity from monsters corrupted by ancient dark magic. No one knows when this corruption started, or how it began.#$b#Some ancient legends speak of a past time when monsters and humans lived in peace. If those times were ever real, they now only exist in stories.#$b#So we, the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, have sworn an oath to protect humans from those monsters. We are, in a way, monster hunters."/pause 1050/speak Marlon "This guild in particular works closely with M. Rasmodius. You may know him as the 'Wizard'.#$b#Every guild has a wizard or witch that supports them. It's paramount our weapons are imbued with magic to pierce the life force of monsters.#$b#You may wonder why we use swords instead of conventional weapons.#$b#To destroy the life force of a monster, you must pierce their life force fibers in a slashing movement.#$b#This is the only way to ensure the monster is defeated, or else it will regenerate.#$b#Projectile weapons unfortunately don't do the trick. They are able to stun monsters, but they still require a good horizontal slash to finish them off.#$b#If you ever use a projectile weapon, you may understand what I mean, unless you use explosives or iridium ammunition."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "Alesia was a gifted sniper who used magic-imbued arrows. She used to be a member of this guild before she moved to Castle Village in the desert.#$b#She used her arrows to stun monsters before finishing them with her dagger."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 800/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 1000/speak Marlon "You may have noticed you're the 23rd adventurer, but there are only a few of us here. We used to have many more members.#$b#Over time, people have left to join other guilds and... and we..."/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 19/pause 650/speak Marlon "We have lost a lot of good people over the years. What we do is dangerous, and it's a thankless job.#$b#Thanks for joining our cause. Your help in protecting the valley is greatly appreciated. I feel as if we're a fully functioning guild again."/pause 800/speak Marlon "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 marlon_event2#I'll do everything I can to protect people.#$r -1 0 marlon_event5#It's dangerous and risky. Someone needs to do it."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 500/speak Marlon "I'm proud to hear that from you. You have the potential to be an excellent swordsman."/pause 1250/speak Marlon "We saw each other at the mines of Corneal Mountain. You may be wondering why we don't just seal off the entrance to the mines.#$b#Unfortunately, Joja owns the rights to the mines and won't allow us to seal it.#$b#It's strange. They don't utilize the mines in any way, despite bountiful amounts of ore.#$b#Because of this, we must venture into the mines and slay monsters before they accumulate in mass."/pause 600/speak Marlon "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 marlon_event4#There must be strong monsters deep in the mines...#$r -1 0 marlon_event3#I'll make it past that floor!"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "I must discolse to you that not every monster is corrupted and hostile.#$b#There is a Shadow Person living the sewer. His name is 'Krobus'. Rasmodius and I have been harboring him.#$b#This is to remain a secret. You'll meet Krobus soon enough. I need to see you prove your worth before I introduce you to him.$2"/pause 1200/speak Marlon "I believe that's enough conversation for you today. I'll speak with you again soon on other matters.#$b#I need to check on a new stock of weapons we just received from the new blacksmith in Castle Village."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Marlon "Remember what I said. Krobus is to remain a secret. There would be dire consequences if anyone got wind of him."

Entries.1004200/y 2/b 1/w rainy: continue/-500 -500/farmer 22 37 0 Marlon 22 15 2/pause 1000/skippable/viewport 22 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000 true/move Marlon 0 9 2 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/pause 5000/speak Marlon "Greetings, @. I don't believe I've seen you up here before."/pause 1150/speak Marlon "I visit this graveyard to pay my respects to those who sacrificed their lives to keep the valley safe."/pause 1200/showFrame Marlon 19/pause 1600/speak Marlon "Many of these adventurers were my friends...$2"/pause 750/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 1250/speak Marlon "I went on an expedition in the mines with a couple First Slash adventurers who were eager to test their mettle.#$b#Imagine their disappointment when we found that the monsters have been thinned out! The progress you've made single-handedly is impressive.$1#$b#Your assistance in keeping the valley safe is a debt I don't think I'll ever be able to repay.$0#$b#To tell you the truth, you remind me of myself when I was your age.$2"/pause 500/emote Marlon 40/speak Marlon "Rasmodius and I privately meet regarding new monster hunters, wizards, witches, and adventurers who join our order."/move Marlon 0 1 2/pause 700/speak Marlon "I want you to join our meetings, @. Your insight would prove most helpful. What do you say?"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I would be honored to join the meetings.#I'm humbled, but I'll leave that to you two."/fork 1004200_Agree/pause 1000/speak Marlon "I understand, @. Keep up the good work protecting Stardew Valley."/pause 1200/speak Marlon "I'll speak to you again regarding other matters.$2"/move Marlon 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end position 21 27
Entries.1004200_Agree: pause 1000/speak Marlon "I'll let you know when we have our next meeting.#$b#We usually meet at the guild building or at Rasmodius' tower.#$b#Sometimes we rent a room at the Stardrop Saloon so we can enjoy good food and drink too."/pause 1500/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 1500/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 1200/speak Marlon "I must be on my way, @...$2"/pause 800/move Marlon 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end position 21 27

Entries.alex_event1: Nice! The sauna is relaxing this time of year.$1
Entries.alex_event2: I sometimes run into her when I come to use the gym and sauna. She's always productive and busy.$1
Entries.alex_event3: Awesome! That sounds like a heck of a leg day!$1

Entries.elliott_event2: Ah, I see! I hope your catch is bountiful!$1
Entries.elliott_event3: We've all had those days, @. Spend some time in the sun and perhaps it will bring your mood up.$2
Entries.elliott_event4: Fantastic! It'll surely be a splendid time.$1
Entries.elliott_event5: Not a problem, @! The sea life isn't for everyone. Perhaps later we can spend some quality time together on land.$1

Entries.harvey_event2: Well, you won't be disappointed. They're top quality, made with all organic ingredients.$1

Entries.sam_event1: Yeah, no kidding it is. It's nice to hear we're both in the same boat.$1
Entries.sam_event2: Whoa! Get real. That's crazy! You're lucky you got that arcade machine. That's worth like... 15,000G at least!$8
Entries.sam_event3: Oh... well, that's all right. To each their own, I guess.$2

Entries.shane_event1: I guess I've been standing here for a while just thinking.$3
Entries.shane_event2: Why am I at the railroad? Just thinking...$3
Entries.shane_event3: Heh, nothing gets past you, does it?$3

Entries.abigail_event1: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event2: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event3: That's... that's a good idea.$2#$b#Sorry, I'm still trying to calm down. Ummm... let me think of a question.$0
Entries.abigail_event4: Umm... I do. let me think... oh, so...$6
Entries.abigail_event5: The Wizard told you? I've never met him...$9
Entries.abigail_event6: I see. Maybe I could look at that book sometime too.$0
Entries.abigail_event7: She is! Apples is very vocal. She's always excited to see me when I visit the forest.$1
Entries.abigail_event8: Umm... about a year ago, I think? I came to the forest to practice a song I was learning, and these little spirits confronted me.$6#$b#At first, I was scared. I thought they were going to hurt me... but Apples was the first Junimo to convey to me that they're peaceful.$0
Entries.abigail_event9: That's funny, you thought they were rats! I saw them as walking apples, which is how Apples got her nickname.$1
Entries.abigail_event10: Oh, that was a long time ago. It makes me wonder if I stumbled across them when I was younger too.$9#$b#Maybe I did... but I can't remember.$2
Entries.abigail_event11: I can't read the language...$2#$b#I've seen it, though.$6#$b#Apples has drawn symbols on the ground and pointed to stone slabs written in it.$0#$b#I knew she was trying to tell me something, but I couldn't understand...$2
Entries.abigail_event12: I did tell my mom and she was... shocked?$2#$b#She told me I have an overactive imagination and that I'm just seeing things. She doesn't take me seriously$9#$b#I also told Sebastian. He laughed at me.$3
Entries.abigail_event13: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2
Entries.abigail_event14: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2

Entries.emily_event1: Oh! This is our signature cocktail. Good choice, @!$1
Entries.emily_event2: You must really love your gin, @. The Lunar Horizon is strong!$1
Entries.emily_event3: The Rosette Nebula is one of my favorites! I'm happy you chose this one.$1
Entries.emily_event4: Oh my! The Big Bang has is pretty strong.$6#$b#I'm sure you can handle it, though!$1
Entries.emily_event5: The Red Moon? This is Robin's favorite! Good choice, @.$1

Entries.clint_event1: I look up to you Adventurer Guild members. You keep everyone safe from monsters.$0
Entries.clint_event2: ...Yeah. I knew a couple of them. Fine adventurers with amazing skill.$2
Entries.clint_event3: I've hiked up there myself. Some of those adventurers had quite the kill count on their tombstones. They were fine people.$0

Entries.demetrius_event1: Robin told me she constructed some new buildings on your farm. I hope they're working out for you!$1
Entries.demetrius_event2: That's a smart idea! Automating the process should save you time!$1
Entries.demetrius_event3: I ran into Marlon recently and he told me you're an Adventurer's Guild member.$0#$b#You must show promise as a skilled swordsman!$1
Entries.demetrius_event5: Haha! You tried to guess at least, @.$1

Entries.dwarf_event3: Yes. There is good in your kind.
Entries.dwarf_event4: Perhaps... but it is still used in a way that causes death and destruction.

Entries.evelyn_event1: My day is well. It's a bit on the chilly side, though.$0
Entries.evelyn_event2: Be sure to wear several layers, sweetie! I wouldn't want you catching a cold.$0
Entries.evelyn_event3: That's unfortunate to hear, dear. I'm optimistic your day will brighten up.$0

Entries.gus_event1: She was here a moment ago. She left to run some errands though.$0
Entries.gus_event2: I see! I was just there. Willy is fishing on the dock right now.$1
Entries.gus_event3: Taking in the view of the Gem Sea, of course!$1
Entries.gus_event4: I always make the effort to visit Sophia when I have free time. She really appreciates it.$2
Entries.gus_event5: Hmm... that's why Sophia hates Joja.$2#$b#She... blames them for the death of her parents.$2

Entries.jodi_event1: ...Yes. You're right.$2#$b#I need to be supportive for Kent. We're in this together, and I need to do everything I can to help him.$2
Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harvey about this. I'm sure he'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.kent_event4: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3
Entries.kent_event5: OUR NATION HAS COMMITTED COUNTLESS ATTROCITIES! WE'VE KILLED THOUSANDS!$3
Entries.kent_event6: MY PLATOON WAS DECIMATED IN AN AMBUSH! I WAS A COWARD!!!$3
Entries.kent_event7: MY PLATOON WAS DECIMATED IN AN AMBUSH! I WAS A COWARD!!!$3

Entries.Jas_event11: I won't wander too far into the forest next time... I promise.$2

Entries.lewis_event1: Great!$1#$b#The residents of Pelican Town would truly appreciate it.$0#$b#You can get right to work on the field. I'll move these barrels and boxes out of the way soon.$1
Entries.lewis_event2: That's fine, @. My offer still stands if you feel differently at a later time.$0#$b#If you do have a change in mind, you can get right to work on the field.$0

Entries.linus_event1: I'm happy to hear that.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event2: Great to hear you're having a productive day.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event3: Haha, I see. Those days are certainly the best.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0

Entries.marnie_event1: That's great to hear! I also get my seeds from Pierre.$1
Entries.marnie_event2: Aww, that's lovely, @. I'm happy you're treating them well.$1
Entries.marnie_event3: Oh, wow! That sounds like a lot of work, @!$1

Entries.vincent_event1: They do! I sometimes find some myself and sell 'em to Willy.$0#$b#He gives me enough to buy some ice cream or some games of Prairie King at the arcade.$1
Entries.vincent_event2: I like ocean creatures a lot! These tide pools allow me to get a good close look of all sorts of them!$0

Entries.willy_event1: Good to hear you're still enjoying fishing, @.$0#$b#I'm happy I gave you my old  rod to get you started!$1
Entries.willy_event2: That is marvelous to hear, @! I'm happy I gave you my old fishing rod to get you started!$1#$b#I never imagined you’d turn out to be such a skilled angler.$1
Entries.willy_event3: Sorry to hear it, @. Hopefully you'll pick up fishing again soon!$0

Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 44 65 1 Alex 50 68 1/skippable/viewport 53 67 true/pause 3000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 2000/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 700/emote Alex 28/playSound leafrustle/move farmer 6 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/jump Alex/pause 800/speak Alex "@! Did you overhear me talking?$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/question fork1 "#Yes, I heard everything.#Not really... why?"/fork didntHear/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... he... well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... the other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... that's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/speak Alex "I'm going to... think about some things for a bit, @.$2"/pause 1200/speak Alex "I'll catch you later.$0"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

It's very important to me."/playMusic none/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/playMusic ragtime/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "I've just got to try new 'Joja Bluu' cola.$5#$b#It's got three times the sorbitol for a thick, sweet blast. And it's cheaper than water!$5"/pause 600/speak Emily "But... But... Isn't soda unhealthy? You promised me...$s"/pause 600/speak Clint "Have no fear, my dear. The world-class science team at Joja Headquarters have determined that 'Joja Bluu' does not cause a significant erosion of the stomach lining. So you can drink it whenever you like, as much as you like.$5#$b#The real question is... 'When will YOU turn bluu?'... *glug* *glug*... Ahh...$5"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Shane "Cut!"/faceDirection Clint 3/move Shane 3 0 1 false/speak Shane "That was perfect."/move Shane 0 -2 1/faceDirection Clint 2 true/move Shane 5 0 0/speak Shane "Thanks for the help. $h"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/speak Emily "...Clint?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/playSound coin/showFrame Clint 39/shake Clint 3000/pause 2000/end dialogue Shane "What a productive day... I got some great footage."

Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/sunny/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 42 73 1 Alex 53 69 0 Caroline 45 60 1 Olivia 47 60 3 Pam 71 69 2 Evelyn 62 57 0/addTemporaryActor Dusty 16 32 -300 -300 2 true/positionOffset Alex -30 0/skippable/viewport 54 69 true/move farmer 12 0 0 true/pause 1000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 300/playSound dog_pant/pause 150/playSound dog_pant true/speak Dusty "!!!$0"/pause 100/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/pause 600/move farmer 0 -4 3/pause 300/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 180/jump Alex/pause 700/speak Alex "@! Entries.didntHear: pause 400/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Oh... I was talking to Dusty.#$b#He and I have a lot in common, actually.$s"/switchEvent AlexFourHeart
Entries.AlexFourHeart: pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 4 true/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... He... Well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... The other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... Bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 0/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/pause 2000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 1/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... That's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/speak Alex "Now... let me show you what Dusty will do for a barbecued steak.$h"/faceDirection Alex 0 0 0/pause 300/playSound dog_bark/pause 300/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 200/playSound dog_bark/speak Dusty "Bark!!!$1"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.Pierre: Happy Spirits' Eve, @!$h#$b#The wizard who lives in the woods created this maze. Apparently, there are two treasure chests hidden in there!$0#$e#But to find the treasure you need to get past the creatures he summoned to guard it... So that'll be a no from me.$s#$b#Best of luck to you if you attempt to find the treasure, @!$h
Entries.Wizard: Hello, @. Have you tried the maze yet? I put in some surprises in there for anyone who dares enter.#0#$e#I might have gone a little overboard with the monsters!$h
Entries.Linus: Hi, @. I hope this evening is treating you well.$0#$b#Many shadow brutes are violent, but these ones are particularly aggressive. If given the opportunity, they would tear you limb from limb!$3#$e#Not all shadow people are violent, though.$0#$b#I'm good friends with one called 'Krobus'. I understand what it's like to be judged for being different.$h#$e#Enjoy the festival.$1

Entries.Wizard: There's a signifcant concentration of mana in this spot. I must analyze its origination.$0#$e#You should head back to the others, @.$0

Entries.Forest.7: There's various produce stored in here.
Entries.Forest.10: These flower beds are in excellent shape.
Entries.Forest.12: You think to yourself that maybe, just maybe there's something magical about this place.
Entries.Forest.13: ` Pelican Town^@ Fairhaven Farm^> Blue Moon Vineyard^
Entries.Forest.14: The "Stardrop Saloon" logo is on the bottles.
Entries.Forest.15: Someone is throwing bottles off the cliff.
Entries.Forest.17: The garbage can has a lock on it.
Entries.Forest.20: It's a bunch of flower beds. They are well taken care of.
Entries.Forest.23: This farm house is abandoned. You see a large collection of various hats inside.
Entries.Forest.24: Farming equipment used to be stored here.
Entries.Forest.25: This crop field is completely overgrown...
Entries.Forest.27: Marnie's silo has 214/240 bushels of hay in it.
Entries.Forest.28: Eww... this green slime smells bad.

Entries.Forest.52: Andy has an iron axe in this crate.

Entries.RailRoad.13: You wonder when the next train will come through Stardew Valley.

Entries.RailRoad.18: Susan takes great care of her flowerbeds.
Entries.RailRoad.19: You respect who laid their sword here.

Entries.Summit.1: -In loving memory of Isabelle-^^"Beloved wife, mentor, and adventurer"^"May you rest in peace, my flower."
Entries.Summit.2: What a spectacular view of Stardew Valley.
Entries.Summit.3: This is a... thing! Yes! A thing!
Entries.Summit.4: You want to sit on this bench and enjoy the amazing view but your character doesn't have a sitting animation.
Entries.Desert.3: At first, you thought there might have been a snake in this vase. Fortunately, there's nothing but sand in it.
Entries.Desert.4: Looking across the oasis, you see tall mountains. Stardew Valley lies on the other side.
Entries.Desert.5: It looks like someone recently damaged the building on purpose. They might have lost some money gambling...
Entries.Desert.6: This cactus doesn't skip leg day.
Entries.Desert.7: This cactus is huge. Knowing that the cactus will continue to grow larger fills you with determination.
Entries.Desert.8: The road ends up ahead. Castle Village lies on the other side of a towering mountain.
Entries.Desert.9: You tried picking up the forage, but instead it prickled your hand. You decide to leave the forage where it is.
Entries.Desert.10: This is an ancient temple of some kind. These statues must be well over 200 years old.
Entries.Desert.11: These are the bones of an ancient dragon. Dragons existed before humans, elves, dwarfs, and even the shadow people. No one knows why they went extinct.
Entries.Desert.12: Skull Cavern... you recall Marlon's stories of other adventurers who went forth into this cave, never to return...
Entries.Desert.13: You shouldn't wander too far into the desert...
Entries.Desert.14: You can see Stardew Valley down the road.

Entries.LostWoods.2: These ruins must be over 100 years old.

Entries.LostWoods.5: It's too worn from age to make out what it says...

Entries.LostWoods.9: This grave has large scratch marks on it, erasing what the descriptions say.

Entries.LostWoods.13: This grave is written in Elvish, and you don't understand the language, but you try to read the descriptions anyway:^^"Laurie lantar lassi surinen, yeni unotime ve ramar aldaron! Yeni ve linte uldar avanier mi oromari lisse-miruvoreva Andune pella, Vardo tellumar nu luini yassen tintilar i eleni omaryo airetari lirinen. Si man i yulma nin enquantuva? An si Tintalle Varda Oiolosseo ve fanyar maryat Elentari ortane."
Entries.LostWoods.14: It's a Dwarfish sword. It looks very heavy...
Entries.LostWoods.15: The stone slab has descriptions:^^"We trade goods for yellow sparkly rocks!"^"Pretty crystal sends you back!"
Entries.LostWoods.16: These trees are growing fruit you're not familiar with.
Entries.LostWoods.17: Ancient fruit plants grow here with ease.
Entries.LostWoods.18: Definitely magic. You're sure of it.
Entries.LostWoods.19: You look across the lake and spot a dozen Junimo huts.

Entries.TownEast.4: This tree must be over 100 years old.
